name: Brian FURMAN, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, and Mike Fisher, Attorney General of PA, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Furman v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation Parole

parties: Brian FURMAN, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, and Mike Fisher, Attorney General of PA, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 23rd day of October, 2003, probable jurisdiction is noted. The order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
834 A.2d 546
Brian FURMAN, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, and Mike Fisher, Attorney General of PA, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 28, 2003.
